skills.skill: Trailhead and Salesforce Rebates and Loyalty Management

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and configure Salesforce CRM initiatives focusing on Manufacturing Cloud and Rebates and Loyalty Engine.
Manage relationships with internal customers to support Customer Loyalty and Rebates, Sales, Service, and Marketing cloud implementations.
Responsible for escalated issue resolution and working with onshore and offshore teams for business continuity.
Configure Manufacturing Cloud and have thorough knowledge of DPE (Data Processing Engine).
Configure points based and dollar-based loyalty programs within Manufacturing Cloud.
Configure rebate transactions and sales agreements, and reverse engineer DPE for industry-specific requirements.
Understand transaction journal dependencies with the rebate management cloud.
Contribute to improving business performance through enterprise solutions and capabilities, including Manufacturing Cloud declarative configuration and DPE development.
Oversee force.com configuration activities, data modeling, data transformation, and salesforce reporting and dashboard development in the lightning framework.
Provide oversight for all enhancements related to Manufacturing & Rebate Cloud.
Experience in requirements elicitation, solution design, development, and deployment of force.com elements using visual studio code.
Translate business requirements to technical designs and effectively debug and reverse engineer current design patterns.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
